Non-fiction

New non-fiction for February 2017

Written by Brandon King · Published Jan 30, 2017

This month's new non-fiction titles span history, animals, transport and autobiography

New non-fiction for January 2017

Written by Brandon King · Published Jan 3, 2017

This month's non-fiction encompasses history, biography, art and health.

New non-fiction for December 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published Nov 28, 2016

This month's new non-fiction features lots of health and fitness titles in time for the new year, as well as some intriguing reads for the Christmas break

New non-fiction for November 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 24, 2016

This month's new non-fiction features travel, history and lots of music

New non-fiction for October 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published Sep 30, 2016

Enjoy Ken Clarke's memoirs, a guide to Hygge and Miranda Hart's book about her dog, Peggy

New non-fiction for September 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 31, 2016

Featuring memoirs from John le Carre and Alan Johnson, Queen Bees – a study of 6 remarkable, between-the-wars society hostesses and Brave, the true story of a young Lowestoft woman who survived a terrifyingly abusive relationship

New non-fiction for August 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 1, 2016

Featuring Martin Pearce and Gerard Fiennes.

Beatrix Potter 150th anniversary

Written by Emma Raindle · Published Jul 5, 2016

28 July marks the 150th anniversary of beloved children's artist and illustrator Beatrix Potter's birth. Explore her life, art and conservation with our collection.

New non-fiction for July 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published Jun 28, 2016

Featuring Jamie Oliver's new cookbook and a true insight to Brighton's police force from Peter James.

New non-fiction for June 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published May 31, 2016

Featuring Nadiya Hussain and Joe Wicks.

BBC Springwatch

Written by Brandon King · Published May 31, 2016

As BBC Springwatch returns to RSPB Minsmere, see our top books on all things wildlife.

New non-fiction for May 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published May 3, 2016

Featuring Wilko Johnson and Tracy Borman.

Charlotte Brontë bicentenary in 2016

Written by Emma Raindle · Published Apr 5, 2016

21 April 2016 marks the bicentenary of Charlotte Brontë's birth. Here's a collection of biographies, fiction and children's books to celebrate Charlotte's legacy.

New non-fiction for April 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published Mar 31, 2016

Featuring Alessandra Peters and Mick Wall.

International Women’s Day in 2016

Written by Emma Raindle · Published Mar 2, 2016

This year's theme for International Women's Day is #PledgeForParity, recognising the need to accelerate gender quality across all cultures in education and the workplace.

New non-fiction for March 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published Mar 1, 2016

Featuring Nick Holland and Tom Bower.

Written by Brandon King · Published Feb 1, 2016

Featuring Mary Berry and Marian Keyes.

Featuring Ruby Wax, Ella Woodward and Amelia Freer.

New non-fiction for December 2015

Written by Brandon King · Published Nov 30, 2015

Featuring Diana Athill and Joe Wicks.

NaNoWriMo 2015

Written by Emma Raindle · Published Nov 3, 2015

Are you taking part in NaNoWriMo (National Novel Writing Month) or interested in writing fiction? Here some inspiration to get you started.
